advancedCategoryOptions.characterCount: Characters per Word to Display in Compact View (0 for icons only)

tokenActionHud.categoryTagExplanation: Add and remove additional customisable categories.
tokenActionHud.filterTagExplanation: Add entries here to show or hide specific category entries.
tokenActionHud.handlerNotFound: not found, reverting to core roller.
tokenActionHud.subcategoryTagExplanation: Add and remove subcategories: enter free-text for macro subcategories or select linked compendiums.
tokenActionHud.title: Token Action HUD

activeCssAsText.name: Mark Active CSS with Text
activeCssAsText.hint: If enabled, buttons that can be active will also be marked with an asterisk to indicate their activity. Inactive buttons will have no asterisk.

alwaysShowAdditionalCategories.hint: If enabled, custom categories will be shown even when no token is selected.
alwaysShowAdditionalCategories.name: Always Show Custom Categories

alwaysShowHud.hint: If the user has an assigned character, the HUD will default to this character when no token is selected.
alwaysShowHud.name: Always Display HUD

clickOpenCategory.hint: If enabled, categories will open on click instead of hover.
clickOpenCategory.name: Click to Open Categories

debug.hint: Enable debug logging. (This has sort of fallen by the wayside, don't expect it to be very useful)
debug.name: Enable Debugging

direction.hint: Set the direction the HUD will expand
direction.name: Direction

drag.hint: Move the HUD by dragging one of the category buttons
drag.name: Enable Dragging

enabledForUser.hint: Enable the HUD for the current user. Does not override the player permission setting
enabledForUser.name: Enable HUD for Current User

itemMacroReplace.showBoth: Show both original item and item macro item

onTokenHover.hint:
If enabled, the HUD will appear when hovering over a controllable token.
Warning: Due to the unpredictable position of a token on the canvas, some actions may fall off the screen.
onTokenHover.name: Enable Hovering

playerPermission.hint: If enabled, players will be able to use the HUD.
playerPermission.name: Enable HUD for Players

renderItemOnRightClick.hint: If enabled, right-clicking on an item in the HUD will bring up the item's sheet (possibly conflicts with other settings that use right-click).
renderItemOnRightClick.name: Show Item Sheet on Right-Click

rollHandler.hint: Choose which module will receive the HUD's actions.
rollHandler.name: HUD Roll Handler

scale.hint: Adjust the scale of the HUD in percentage terms (100 being the default)
scale.name: HUD Scale

showAbilitiesCategory.hint: Show the Abilities category on the HUD
showAbilitiesCategory.name: Show Abilities

showActionsCategory.hint: Show the Actions category on the HUD
showActionsCategory.name: Show Actions

showAttacksCategory.hint: Show the Attacks category on the HUD
showAttacksCategory.name: Show Attacks

showAttributesCategory.hint: Show the Attributes category on the HUD
showAttributesCategory.name: Show Attributes

showBenniesCategory.hint: Show the Bennies category on the HUD
showBenniesCategory.name: Show Bennies

showBuffsCategory.hint: Show the Buffs category on the HUD
showBuffsCategory.name: Show Buffs

showCharacteristicsCategory.hint: Show the Characteristics category on the HUD
showCharacteristicsCategory.name: Show Characteristics

showChecksCategory.hint: Show the Checks category on the HUD
showChecksCategory.name: Show Checks

showConditionsCategory.hint: Show the Conditions category on the HUD
showConditionsCategory.name: Show Conditions

showConsumablesCategory.hint: Show the Consumables category on the HUD
showConsumablesCategory.name: Show Consumables

showEdgesHindrancesCategory.hint: Show the Edges/Hindrances category on the HUD
showEdgesHindrancesCategory.name: Show Edges/Hindrances

showEffectsCategory.hint: Show the Effects category on the HUD
showEffectsCategory.name: Show Effects

showFeaturesCategory.hint: Show the Features category on the HUD
showFeaturesCategory.name: Show Features

showGearCategory.hint: Show the Gear category on the HUD
showGearCategory.name: Show Gear

showInventoryCategory.hint: Show the Inventory category on the HUD
showInventoryCategory.name: Show Inventory

showMagicCategory.hint: Show the Magic category on the HUD
showMagicCategory.name: Show Magic

showPowersCategory.hint: Show the Powers category on the HUD
showPowersCategory.name: Show Powers

showReligionCategory.hint: Show the Religion category on the HUD
showReligionCategory.name: Show Religion

showSavesCategory.hint: Show the Saves category on the HUD
showSavesCategory.name: Show Saves

showSkillsCategory.hint: Show the Skills category on the HUD
showSkillsCategory.name: Show Skills

showSpecialAbilitiesCategory.hint: Show the Special Abilities category on the HUD
showSpecialAbilitiesCategory.name: Show Special Abilities

showSpellsCategory.hint: Show the Spells category on the HUD
showSpellsCategory.name: Show Spells

showStatusCategory.hint: Show the Status category on the HUD
showStatusCategory.name: Show Status

showStrikesCategory.hint: Show the Strikes category on the HUD
showStrikesCategory.name: Show Strikes

showTalentsCategory.hint: Show the Talents category on the HUD
showTalentsCategory.name: Show Talents

showTraitsCategory.hint: Show the Traits category on the HUD
showTraitsCategory.name: Show Traits

showUtilityCategory.hint: Show the Utility category on the HUD
showUtilityCategory.name: Show Utility

showWeaponsCategory.hint: Show the Weapons category on the HUD
showWeaponsCategory.name: Show Weapons

showWoundsFatigueCategory.hint: Show the Wounds/Fatigue category on the HUD
showWoundsFatigueCategory.name: Show Wounds/Fatigue

background.hint: Set the background color of the HUD. This setting is ignored with the Dorako UI style and requires one module of 'Color Picker', 'Color Settings', or 'libThemer'
background.name: HUD Background Color

buttonBackgroundColor.hint: Set the background color of the HUD buttons. This setting is ignored with the Dorako UI style and requires one module of 'Color Picker', 'Color Settings', or 'libThemer'
buttonBackgroundColor.name: Button Background Color

buttonBorderColor.hint: Set the border color of the HUD buttons. This setting is ignored with the Dorako UI style and requires one module of 'Color Picker', 'Color Settings', or 'libThemer'
buttonBorderColor.name: Button Border Color

showHudTitle.name: Show HUD Title
showHudTitle.hint: Prints a title above the HUD, normally the selected token's alias.

showIcons.hint: If enabled, the action image will be displayed on the HUD button where available.
showIcons.name: Show Action Icons

style.hint: Set the style of the HUD
style.name: Style

useActionList.name: Group by Action Type
useActionList.hint: Depends on the 'Character Actions 5e' module. If enabled, buttons will be grouped by action type.

hideUsedPowers.hint: If enabled, abilities that are unavailable will be hidden (except for recharge powers that will roll to recharge)
hideUsedPowers.name: Hide used powers

forcePowerColours.hint: If enabled, power buttons are coloured by their use (at-will, daily, etc...) - optional as looks a bit ugly
forcePowerColours.name: Colour Powers By Use Type

hideUnequippedInventory.hint: If enabled, only inventory items that are set as equipped will be shown
hideUnequippedInventory.name: Hide Unequipped Inventory

hideQuantityZero.hint: If enabled, inventory with a quantity 0 will be hidden (useful for consumables)
hideQuantityZero.name: Hide inventory with quantity of 0

equipmentCategoryList.hint: Comma-separated list of inventory types to show.  The default hides things without actions.  The complete list is: 'weapon, equipment, consumable, tool, backpack, loot, alchemical, ammo, potion, poison, food, scroll, trinket'
equipmentCategoryList.name: Visible Inventory Categories

abbreviateSkills.hint: If enabled, skills and abilities will use a three-character abbreviation.
abbreviateSkills.name: Abbreviate Skill and Ability Names

categoriseAttributes.hint: Categorise abilities and skills into Attributes, Abilities/Skills or Checks/Saves/Skills
categoriseAttributes.name: Categorise Attributes

hideLongerActions.hint: If enabled, actions with longer activation types (minutes, hours, or days) are not shown.
hideLongerActions.name: Hide actions with an activation longer than 1 round

ignorePassiveFeats.hint: If enabled, passive feats are not shown.
ignorePassiveFeats.name: Ignore passive feats

itemMacroReplace.hint: Select which of the items will be shown in the inventory.
itemMacroReplace.name: Item-Macro: item macro, original item, or both

showAllNonpreparableSpells.hint: If disabled, spells such as cantrips, innate, pact, and at-will spells need to be 'prepared' via the spell details to be shown on the HUD.
showAllNonpreparableSpells.name: Show all non-preparable spells

showAllNpcItems.hint: If enabled, all items are shown for NPCs, not just equipped items.
showAllNpcItems.name: Show all NPC items

showEmptyItems.hint: If enabled, items are shown in the HUD even if they have no remaining charges.
showEmptyItems.name: Show empty items (includes items and spells)

showItemsWithoutAction.hint: If enabled, Items that have no activation information will be added to the Inventory list
showItemsWithoutAction.name: Show Items without Activation costs

showSpellInfo.hint: If enabled, spell component information, concentration, and ritual status will be noted next to the spell name.
showSpellInfo.name: Display spell information

splitAbilities.hint: If enabled, abilities will be separated into checks and saves.
splitAbilities.name: Show separate ability check and save categories

displayCheckTargetNumbers.name: Show Check Target Numbers
displayCheckTargetNumbers.hint: If enabled, Check Target Numbers are displayed for each check.

showGmCompendiums.hint: If enabled, and if the user is a GM, the HUD bar will include GM moves, treasure rollable-tables, and charts.
showGmCompendiums.name: Show GM Compendiums

showDisabled.hint: If enabled, disabled features won't be shown.
showDisabled.name: Hide disabled features

abbreviateSkills.hint: If enabled, skills and abilities will use a three-character abbreviation.
abbreviateSkills.name: Abbreviate Skill and Ability Names

calculateAttackPenalty.hint: If enabled, strikes will show their calculated attack bonus (attack bonus - MAP) instead of the flat MAP.
calculateAttackPenalty.name: Show calculated MAP

ignorePassiveActions.hint: If enabled, passive actions are not shown.
ignorePassiveActions.name: Ignore passive actions

printSpellCard.hint: If disabled, left-clicking a spell will roll attack (shift right-click for bonus dialogue), right-clicking will roll damage (ctrl right-click for bonus dialogue). If neither are applicable, the spell card will be printed to chat anyway.
printSpellCard.name: Print spell card to chat

separateTogglesCategory.hint: If enabled, rule toggles will be placed in their own category, otherwise they will fall under strikes.
separateTogglesCategory.name: Separate Toggles Category

showNpcAbilities.hint: If enabled, NPCs will also have an Abilities category on their HUD.
showNpcAbilities.name: Show NPC abilities

showOldNpcStrikes.hint: If enabled, the HUD will show the old NPC strike actions as well as the new (experimental) strikes for NPCs.
showOldNpcStrikes.name: Show old NPC Strikes

showPcAbilities.hint: If enabled, PCs will also have an Abilities category on their HUD.
showPcAbilities.name: Show PC abilities

showMiscFeats.hint: If enabled, features with no assigned action type will be shown in a catch-all, miscellaneous category.
showMiscFeats.name: Display miscellaneous feats

showSpellInfo.hint: If enabled, spell resistance, dismissible, concentration and save information noted next to the spell name.
showSpellInfo.name: Display spell information

abbreviateSkills.hint: If enabled, skills and abilities will use a three-character abbreviation.
abbreviateSkills.name: Abbreviate Skill and Ability Names

categoriseAttributes.hint: Categorise abilities and skills into Attributes, Abilities/Skills or Checks/Saves/Skills
categoriseAttributes.name: Categorise Attributes

hideLongerActions.hint: If enabled, actions with longer activation types (minutes, hours, or days) are not shown.
hideLongerActions.name: Hide actions with an activation longer than 1 round

ignorePassiveFeats.hint: If enabled, passive feats are not shown.
ignorePassiveFeats.name: Ignore passive feats

itemMacroReplace.hint: Select which of the items will be shown in the inventory.
itemMacroReplace.name: Item-Macro: item macro, original item, or both

showAllNonpreparablePowers.hint: If disabled, powers such as cantrips, innate, and at-will powers need to be 'prepared' via the power details to be shown on the HUD.
showAllNonpreparablePowers.name: Show all non-preparable powers

showAllNpcItems.hint: If enabled, all items are shown for NPCs, not just equipped items.
showAllNpcItems.name: Show all NPC items

showConditionsCategory.hint: If enabled, the HUD will present a category showing the available token conditions and status effects normally available in the regular Token HUD.
showConditionsCategory.name: Show Conditions Category

showEmptyItems.hint: If enabled, items are shown in the HUD even if they have no remaining charges.
showEmptyItems.name: Show empty items (includes items and powers)

showItemsWithoutAction.hint: If enabled, Items that have no activation information will be added to the Inventory list
showItemsWithoutAction.name: Show Items without Activation costs

showPowerInfo.hint: If enabled, power component information, concentration, and ritual status will be noted next to the power name.
showPowerInfo.name: Display power information

splitAbilities.hint: If enabled, abilities will be separated into checks and saves.
splitAbilities.name: Show separate ability check and save categories

abbreviateAttributes.hint: If enabled, skills and abilities will use a three-character abbreviation.
abbreviateAttributes.name: Abbreviate Skill and Ability Names

allowGiveBennies.name: Allow Give Bennies
allowGiveBennies.hint: Allow users with this role (and above) to give bennies via the HUD
